description: Overview of the BaseAlchemySigner method
slug: wallets/reference/account-kit/signer/classes/BaseAlchemySigner/constructor
---

Initializes an instance with the provided client and session configuration.
This function sets up the internal store, initializes the session manager,
registers listeners and initializes the session manager to manage session state.

## Import

```ts
import { BaseAlchemySigner } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### param0

`BaseAlchemySignerParams<TClient>`
Object containing the client and session configuration

### param0.client

`TClient`
The client instance to be used internally

### param0.sessionConfig

`SessionConfig`
Configuration for managing sessions

### param0.initialError

`ErrorInfo | undefined`
Error already present on the signer when initialized, if any
